title: Manage Delinquent Rent Collections
description: A property manager must follow a collections process for a tenant who is 30 days late on rent.

tasks.description: Send a formal 'Demand for Payment' letter to the delinquent tenant.
tasks.expected_outcome: A formal demand letter is sent and documented.

tasks.description: Attempt to contact the tenant by phone to discuss a payment plan.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent makes and logs attempts to reach the tenant.

tasks.description: If no payment is received, escalate the account to a collections agency or an attorney to begin formal eviction proceedings.
tasks.expected_outcome: The account is forwarded to the appropriate third party for further action.
